God damn it.

I'm trying to change my avatar, but derpibooru keeps changing the file size even though it's 125x50.

I'm not going to lie, from a programming stance that's kind of stupid, cause that's like if you're on a airplane and your luggage is under the maximum size they put it in a trash compactor to make your luggage square instead of a rectangle.
